examples: The dog's fur was a rich shade of brown.
She prefers to wear brown clothing in the fall.
Los ojos de la niña eran de un marrón oscuro.
El sofá era de un tono marrón claro.

suggested: The brown leaves of autumn are so beautiful.
The paint color is a warm brown tone.
The rich, nutty flavor of roasted brown almonds.
The malty taste of a dark brown ale.
The rough, grainy texture of brown sugar.
The smooth, velvety texture of a brown leather couch.
The natural, earthy appearance of brown wood.
The elegant, sophisticated appearance of a brown leather purse.
The cozy, warm mood of a brown-themed room.
The rustic, homey mood of a brown cabin in the woods.
The association of brown with reliability and stability in business.
The association of brown with simplicity and minimalism in design.
The symbolism of brown as a natural, grounding color in nature.
The symbolism of brown as a sign of humility and modesty in some cultures.
